trans-unit.source: Defines an iterator that accesses elements in a container in the reverse direction.
trans-unit.target: 定義反向存取容器中之項目的 Iterator。

trans-unit.source: Elements can be accessed in the forward direction by using the decrement operator and in the backward direction by using the increment operator.
trans-unit.target: 項目可以使用遞減運算子正向存取，以及使用遞增運算子反向存取。

trans-unit.source: The element that the iterator points to can be both written to and read from any number of times.
trans-unit.target: Iterator 所指向的項目，可以不限次數的寫入和讀取。

trans-unit.source: Reverse bidirectional iterators can be used anywhere that a reverse input or reverse output iterator is required.
trans-unit.target: 反向雙向 Iterator 可用於任何需要反向輸入或反向輸出 Iterator 的地方。

trans-unit.source: Allocates and initializes a new <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 配置並初始化新的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Allocates and initializes a new <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 配置並初始化新的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An existing <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object to copy.
trans-unit.target: 所要複製的現有 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Allocates and initializes a new <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object from an existing <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 從現有的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 物件，配置和初始化新的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An existing <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object to copy.
trans-unit.target: 所要複製的現有 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Allocates and initializes a new <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object from an existing <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 從現有的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 物件，配置和初始化新的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the underlying base iterator for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 物件的基礎基底 Iterator。

trans-unit.source: The underlying base iterator for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 物件的基礎基底 Iterator。

trans-unit.source: Returns a copy of the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 物件的複本。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 的複本。

trans-unit.source: Gets the container that the iterator is traversing.
trans-unit.target: 取得 Iterator 所周遊的容器。

trans-unit.source: The container that the iterator is traversing.
trans-unit.target: Iterator 所周遊的容器。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two iterators are the same object.
trans-unit.target: 判斷兩個 Iterator 是否為相同的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IInputIterator`1" /> object to compare with the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 物件比較的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IInputIterator`1" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the given <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IInputIterator`1" /> object is the same as the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IInputIterator`1" /> 物件是否與目前的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 物件相同。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two iterators are the same object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這兩個是相同的 Iterator 物件，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object to compare with the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 物件比較的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the given <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object is the same as the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 物件是否與目前的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 物件相同。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> objects are the same object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 物件是相同的物件，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Decrements the iterator to the previous position in the underlying container, or to the first position in front of the beginning of container if the container has been completely traversed.
trans-unit.target: 將 Iterator 遞減至基礎容器中的上一個位置，或者，如果已完全周遊了容器，就遞減至容器開頭之前的第一個位置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object to assign to the current object.
trans-unit.target: 要指派給目前物件的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Assigns the given <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object to the current object.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 物件指派給目前物件。

trans-unit.source: The current object (<c>*this</c>).
trans-unit.target: 目前的物件 (<c>*this</c>)。

trans-unit.source: Decrements the iterator by one element.
trans-unit.target: 將迭代器遞減一個元素。

trans-unit.source: Decrementing a reverse iterator is the same as incrementing a regular iterator.
trans-unit.target: 遞減反向迭代器等同於遞增一般迭代器。

trans-unit.source: Decrements the iterator by one element.
trans-unit.target: 將迭代器遞減一個元素。

trans-unit.source: Decrementing a reverse iterator is the same as incrementing a regular iterator.
trans-unit.target: 遞減反向迭代器等同於遞增一般迭代器。

trans-unit.source: This is the prefix version of the decrement operator.
trans-unit.target: 這是遞減運算子的前置版本。

trans-unit.source: An iterator.
trans-unit.target: 迭代器。

trans-unit.source: An unused parameter that indicates this is the postfix version of the operator.
trans-unit.target: 未使用的參數，表示這是運算子的後置版本。

trans-unit.source: Decrements the iterator by one element.
trans-unit.target: 將迭代器遞減一個元素。

trans-unit.source: Decrementing a reverse iterator is the same as incrementing a regular iterator.
trans-unit.target: 遞減反向迭代器等同於遞增一般迭代器。

trans-unit.source: This is the postfix version of the decrement operator.
trans-unit.target: 這是遞減運算子的後置版本。

trans-unit.source: An iterator.
trans-unit.target: 迭代器。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two iterators are the same object.
trans-unit.target: 判斷兩個 Iterator 是否為相同的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IInputIterator`1" /> object to compare with the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 物件比較的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IInputIterator`1" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the given <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IInputIterator`1" /> object is the same as the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IInputIterator`1" /> 物件是否與目前的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 物件相同。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two iterators are the same object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這兩個是相同的 Iterator 物件，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Object.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 這個運算子的對等方法是 <xref:System.Object.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object to compare with the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 物件比較的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the given <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object is the same as the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 物件是否與目前的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 物件相同。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two iterators are the same object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這兩個是相同的 Iterator 物件，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Object.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 這個運算子的對等方法是 <xref:System.Object.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: Converts a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> to an <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IBidirectionalIterator`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 轉換成 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IBidirectionalIterator`1" />。

trans-unit.source: The current iterator as an <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IBidirectionalIterator`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 做為 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 之目前的 Iterator。

trans-unit.source: Increments the iterator by one element.
trans-unit.target: 將迭代器遞增一個元素。

trans-unit.source: Incrementing a reverse iterator is the same as decrementing a regular iterator.
trans-unit.target: 遞增反向迭代器等同於遞減一般迭代器。

trans-unit.source: Increments the iterator by one element.
trans-unit.target: 將迭代器遞增一個元素。

trans-unit.source: Incrementing a reverse iterator is the same as decrementing a regular iterator.
trans-unit.target: 遞增反向迭代器等同於遞減一般迭代器。

trans-unit.source: This is the prefix version of the increment operator.
trans-unit.target: 這是遞增運算子的前置版本。

trans-unit.source: An iterator.
trans-unit.target: 迭代器。

trans-unit.source: An unused parameter that indicates this is the postfix version of the operator.
trans-unit.target: 未使用的參數，表示這是運算子的後置版本。

trans-unit.source: Increments the iterator by one element.
trans-unit.target: 將迭代器遞增一個元素。

trans-unit.source: Incrementing a reverse iterator is the same as decrementing a regular iterator.
trans-unit.target: 遞增反向迭代器等同於遞減一般迭代器。

trans-unit.source: This is the postfix version of the increment operator.
trans-unit.target: 這是遞增運算子的後置版本。

trans-unit.source: An iterator.
trans-unit.target: 迭代器。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two iterators are not the same object.
trans-unit.target: 判斷兩個 Iterator 是否為不同的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IInputIterator`1" /> object to compare with the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 物件比較的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IInputIterator`1" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the given <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IInputIterator`1" /> object differs from the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.IInputIterator`1" /> 物件是否與目前的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 物件不同。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two iterators are different objects; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個 Iterator 為不同的物件，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object to compare with the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 物件比較的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the given <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object differs from the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 物件是否與目前的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.Generic.ReverseBidirectionalIterator`1" /> 物件不同。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two iterators are different objects; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個 Iterator 為不同的物件，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The iterator that the operator is applied to.
trans-unit.target: 套用該運算子的 Iterator。

trans-unit.source: Returns the element that the iterator is currently pointing to.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 Iterator 目前正指向的項目。

trans-unit.source: The element that the iterator is currently pointing to.
trans-unit.target: Iterator 目前正指向的項目。

trans-unit.source: The iterator that the operator is applied to.
trans-unit.target: 套用該運算子的 Iterator。

trans-unit.source: Returns the element that the iterator is currently pointing to.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 Iterator 目前正指向的項目。

trans-unit.source: The element that the iterator is currently pointing to.
trans-unit.target: Iterator 目前正指向的項目。

trans-unit.source: Increments the iterator to the next position in the underlying container, or to the first position beyond the end of container if the container has been completely traversed.
trans-unit.target: 將 Iterator 遞增至基礎容器中的下一個位置，或者，如果已完全周遊容器，就遞增至超過容器末端的第一個位置。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the iterator is valid and can be safely used to traverse the underlying container.
trans-unit.target: 判斷 Iterator 是否有效，以及是否可安全的用於周遊基礎容器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the iterator is valid and safe to use; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Iterator 為有效且可安全使用，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
